snippet: Several players playing early Saturday remarked how much slower the greens at the Olympic Club were compared to the first two rounds. Customarily, the greens at the United States Open get quicker as they dry out.
abstract: Several players playing early Saturday remarked how much slower the greens at the Olympic Club were compared to the first two rounds. Customarily, the greens at the United States Open get quicker as they dry out.

headline.main: Greens Slow as Tournament Goes On
